category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 9 (Remarks, Statements, etc.)
contents: Article 9 (Speech, Statement, etc.) ① Delegates who wish to speak at the general meeting may raise their hands and state their name and affiliation and then speak with permission from the chairman. ② When two or more people request to speak, the chairperson shall designate the person who raises his or her hand first to speak. ③ The vice president, auditor, secretary general, and athlete village head may attend the general meeting and state their opinions.
